title: The Paradine Case
creator_credit: Alfred Hitchcock, David O. Selznick and Selznick Pictures
brief_description: Gregory Peck plays Anthony Keane, a brilliant young lawyer, at the height of his professional career, charged with the defence of a married woman accused of murdering her blind husband. Keane falls madly in love with his client Mrs. Paradine played by Alida Vali, who convinces him of her innocence. The tension builds from their first meeting and finally erupts in an emotionally charged courtroom. Rated: PG
